sentences.en: All the forces of the anti - imperialist camp are uniting and forging ahead.
sentences.cn: 反 帝国主义阵营的一切力量,正在团结起来,并正在向前发展.

sentences.en: Bhutto was an important anti - imperialist leader in the Third World.
sentences.cn: 布托也是第三世界重要的 反 帝国主义领袖.

sentences.en: Chinese nationalism originates in reactions to imperialist invasions of China.
sentences.cn: 中国民族主义亦源于对帝国主义侵华之反动.

sentences.en: Generally speaking, they might make some contribution to the anti - imperialist struggle.
sentences.cn: 一般说来, 他们对反帝斗争是可以做出一些贡献的.

sentences.en: He claims that imperialists are trying to re-establish colonial rule in the country.
sentences.cn: 他声称帝国主义者正试图在该国重建殖民统治。

sentences.en: If we do a good job, we can root out imperialist oppression.
sentences.cn: 搞得好了, 可以根本取消帝国主义的压迫.

sentences.en: Imperialist aggression has met with strong opposition from the people throughout the world.
sentences.cn: 帝国主义的侵略遭到全世界人民的强烈反对.

sentences.en: Imperialist powers always tend to gobble up their weaker neighbors.
sentences.cn: 帝国主义强国总是要想兼并弱小的邻国.

sentences.en: Mr Koizumi is no diehard imperialist.
sentences.cn: 小泉不是顽固的帝国主义分子.

sentences.en: The American imperialist will be given a fair and honest trial.
sentences.cn: 帝国主义分子会给予公正的审判.

sentences.en: The Chinese people have been freed from imperialist oppression.
sentences.cn: 中国人民已经从帝国主义的压迫下解放出来了.

sentences.en: The developed nations have all benefited from their imperialist exploitation.
sentences.cn: 发达国家都从他们帝国主义的剥削中获益。

sentences.en: The imperialist powers forced the Qing Dynasty to sign a series of unequal treaties.
sentences.cn: 帝国主义列强迫使清王朝签订了一系列不平等条约.

sentences.en: The play is being widely read as an allegory of imperialist conquest.
sentences.cn: 这部剧被广泛解读为对帝国主义征服的讽喻。

sentences.en: There are a few imperialist powers, but what of it?
sentences.cn: 几个帝国主义算什么 呢 ?

sentences.en: They must free themselves from imperialist control.
sentences.cn: 他们必须使自己摆脱帝国主义控制.

sentences.en: This refers to the anti - imperialist patriotic movement on May 30, 1925.
sentences.cn: 指一九二五年五月三十日爆发的反帝爱国运动.

words.tran_cn: 帝国的；皇帝的；至高无上的；威严的
帝国主义的；帝国主义者的；拥护帝国主义的
帝王般地；威严地；帝国地

trans.tran_en: Imperialist means relating to or based on imperialism

trans.tran_cn: 帝国主义者，皇帝的支持者，帝制拥护者
trans.tran_en: An imperialist is someone who has imperialist views
